籤詩版本二:
Lapho umoya ukhanyisa amakhandlela nezithunzi ezigqagqene esibhakabhakeni, ziba njengezimbali esibukweni lapho ezunywa umbono.
Ukudinwa nokuncengwa yizingane ukuthi ziqoqe, ngangazi ngani ukuthi inkohliso nje?
詩意:
Le hexagram ifana nomoya okhanyisa ikhandlela.
Idumela elingamanga lilimaza yonke into.
解曰: Umcebo usezulwini. Ubumpofu buyikusasa. Asikho isidingo sokufuna iseluleko. Konke kunqunyelwe ngaphambili.
籤詩故事一:
◇Uhambo Lwesithupha luka-Kong Ming ukuphuma e-Qishan
Ngesikhathi seMibuso Emithathu, i-Qishan Mountain yagijima yawela i-Wei ne-Shu. U-Kong Ming waphuma ephindelela e-Qishan Mountain ukuze ahlasele i-Wei kodwa wehluleka.
Ngesikhathi sesithupha ephuma eya eQishan, u-Kong Ming wabhala imiyalelo yakhe, kodwa akaphumelelanga ekugcineni. Ekugcineni, uZhuge Liang wabulawa ukugula eWuzhangyuan eneminyaka engu-54 ngenxa yokusebenza ngokweqile.
(Le ndaba isingathekiso esithi "ukuhlakanipha akulingani nekarma").
聖意: Khulekela umuzi wakho qaphela funa ingcebo nenzuzo qaphela ebhizinisini qaphela umshado wakho qaphela umshado wakho uphephe uvikeleke ube nabantu lahlekelwa izikelemu konakele kulahlekelwa imfuyo , ukuduka, ukuduka, ukumangalelwa emphakathini, ukulahlekelwa yimali, ukufudukela kwelinye ilizwe, ukulondolozwa kwemithetho, ukulahlekelwa yimpahla, ukugula, ukugula, ukuba lecala lenguquko enkulu eYinshan,
